collection.name: Luna Child no Saishuu Bouei Line

name: Luna Child no Saishuu Bouei Line 2
storyline:
In the past, the three fairies of light dug a hole under the Jizo. However, when after Marisa Kirisame got stuck in it, it was filled in as if nothing had happened.
One night, Luna child went out for a walk and found that the hole had suddenly opened slowly.
When he fearfully went to take a peek, he found that it had become an unclean spot where a large number of furballs had gathered.
In no time at all, a large tree began to be invaded by the furballs, and the tree was in mortal danger.
summary: A doujin game by ENAMEL SWORD based on the Touhou Project series.
